author: akarasulu
msg: moving old stuff out of the way

author: akarasulu
msg: Creating new consolidation branch to handle separation of eve sources into 2
container independent maven projects.  One for the Eve frontend services and
another for the plain old java object (POJO) implementations of those
interfaces.  This will help us meet certain goals with respect to ClassLoader
management and avoid various pitfalls.  An email trail leading to this
realization is available here on nagoya:
The JIRA for these alterations can also be found here:
